Perspective



This device somehow explains the trick perspective used in the alice-in-wonderland room.
Taken Monday, July 02, 2001, 12:46:04pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 961kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/4s @ F2.8, ISO 200, 38mm
